description:
Gow (Gnu On Windows) is the lightweight alternative to Cygwin.


- Added ssh.bat alias for plink ticket
- Fixed tar libiconv-2.dll issue ticket
- Fixed version name issue ticket
- Added Nano 2.3.1 ticket
- Updated PuTTY to 0.63 ticket
- Renamed 'sort.exe' to 'gsort.exe' so the Unix version is used ticket
- Added cURL 7.35.0 ticket
- Added Vim 7.3_46 ticket
